title: Synthesis and hygrothermal aging of polycarbonates containing a bisphenol fluorene moiety
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17771-17779
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03378G, Paper

Tao Lu, Wei Fang, Qian Zhou, Mengjuan Liu, Guozhang Wu
This study aims to synthesize a specific type of polycarbonate with high refractive index, low birefringence, and resistance to hygrothermal aging.
